GeneralError.Message: A general error has occurred. See ExtendedInfo for more information.

ResourceNotFound.Resolution: Provide a valid resource and resubmit the request.

MethodNotAllowed.Message: The HTTP method is not allowed on the resource.
MethodNotAllowed.Resolution: Change the method and resubmit the request.

Unauthorized.Resolution: Provide valid credentials and resubmit the request.

InsufficientPrivilege.Message: The user does not have sufficient privilege to perform the requested operation.
InsufficientPrivilege.Resolution: Use an account with the required privilege or contact your administrator.
